===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[close]]; to [[shut]]
#: {{zh-ant|開}}
#: {{zh-x|關 窗子{zi}|'''close''' the window}}
#* {{zh-x|他 在 聖誕節 時 關 了 店鋪。|He shut up his shop at Christmas.}}
# to [[lock up]]; to [[detain]]
#* {{zh-x|那 囚犯 被 關 在 單人 牢房 內。|The prisoner was locked in a cell.}}
# to [[turn off]]; to [[switch off]]
#: {{zh-x|關 電燈|to switch the light off}}
# to [[concern]]; to [[implicate]]; to [[relate]] to
#: {{zh-x|這 不 關 我 的 事。|It does not concern me.}}
# [[frontier]] [[pass]]
# [[relation]] (family/contacts)
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
